name: Red Nut
description:
Red Nut is a 2 players Shoot em up created by Enjmin Students in France

Play a cute raccoon or a small squirrel addicted to nicotine and kill anything that moves to retrieve cigarettes. Pick up new weapons, beat the bosses and get cancer !

Warning ! Smoking seriously harms you and others around you :/ !!

Play with controllers !

Game designer : Charlotte Couder

2D Artist : Bảo Linh Võ, Noémie Szmrzsik-Cohard

Sound designer : Timothée Sonnier

Developer : Whitney Burner, Benjamin Pelmoine

UI UX Designer : Guillaume Voisinet
